activities: E. & J. Gallo Winery processes EEA and Swiss personal data relating to (1) employees of E. & J. Gallo's subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland for purposes of global HR administration and management; (2) individual actual and prospective customers, and individual representatives of actual and prospective corporate customers, distributors, suppliers, and other business partners in the EEA and Switzerland, for purposes of invoicing, communicating, and administering the business relationship with such customers.
contactoff1: E. & J. Gallo Winery - Legal Department
